column4: hello) i'm trying to install ubuntu9.04 alternate in my new pc which already have 2 harddisk in raid0 and win7 installed on it... I've read many guides and tutorials about raid 0 and dual boot bla bla bla but I am really stuck+ bit bored of formatting / reinstall everything all the time.... anyone can take care of me ?
how can I explain...all my installs have failed so far :|
I tried installing win7 first and leaving space for ubuntu to partition : fail...i tried installing ubuntu alternate and make the partitions for it and leaving space for win7 : failed
